website_summaries.verdict: Customers searching for a onesie for their toddlers should check out this adorable option from Just Love.
pros: These toddler-friendly onesies are offered in many different animal designs, such as pandas, lions, and ducks
cons: Online pictures are inaccurate as the onesies come with footed design

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a last minute costume. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a last minute costume. I was sick of wearing costumes that would make me freeze out in the Chicago weather. I am a 4'11 120 woman and it worked perfectly on me. Only thing that didn't fit right was I wish the hoodie would had been a bit bigger to show off the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Size 5/6 has feet
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a hooded/footed pajama sleeper for my 5 year old - who loves to get "cozy" in them. It's really hard to find ones that are both footed and hooded in this size. When I found these, I hit the jackpot. They are cute and soft have held up in the wash. I quickly ordered a few more in different styles - all in size 5/6. I can confirm that every one of the size 5/6 that I ordered had feet. Dragon, Bear, Panda Bear ... My daughter wears a size 5 clothing and she's got plenty of room to grow. We really love these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this if your child is a troublemaker. It'll make them way too cute to correct their behavior, and then your home will be overrun by adorable madness. (It fit my 3.5 yr old nephew really well. It's soft and warm, perfect to snuggle up in after his bath before bedtime.)
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Softest onesie ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter weighs about 50 pounds and is more on the petite side and I got her her a size small 7-8 and it fit perfectly. A little baggie in the crotch, but it gives her room to grow and these are meant to be a little baggie. But it is just the softest thing ever, like a Sherpa blanket or lambs wool. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not footless but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably soft and is exactly like pictures EXCEPT it has feet while the pictures do not. I was specifically looking for a dinosaur costume that my son could go trick or treating in that didnt have the slippers. Because this does, now I'll have to either buy him bigger shoes or let him go around in basically socks. I couldn't find that detail anywhere in the description so I'm a little disappointed BUT it's fantastic quality and surprisingly low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wiegert

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered two of them now and both have had ripped seams. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first one because of a sizing issue and the seam was ripped. Bought a second one and after three wears this one has a hole as well. The only reason it's even getting one star from me is because of how much my son loves it. I'm not happy about having to fix ripped seams.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Sewing kit not included...
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric and design of the animal and it is warm, but.... get ready to get your sowing kit out. After just two uses and one wash, the tail area developed three separate and massive holes in the seams. Very disappointed in the craftsmanship. Good thing for my son I know how to sew and have a fairly good sowing kit!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3T for my 2T daughter because of people saying it ran small. I shouldn’t have done that. Order whatever size your child is, no bigger. She was drowning in it at first. She can wear it right now, almost a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Hole in suit after first wearing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Panda bear suit for my 2 yr old (ordered up 2 sizes and got a 4T). The suit fits everywhere so I was surprised to see that there was a big hole in the crotch of the suit after the first wearing! Not sure what the seller recommends?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this four stars because the hood/shoulder area is weird and ill fitting. Perfect if your child does not actually have a neck, but mine does. Otherwise very cute and made a great warm Halloween costume for our bunny obsessed toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobaru

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved this
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. We got it for her Halloween costume but wears these all the time for bed and even for school some days. Nice and warm great for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S.

customer_reviews.title: Hood seems too small but suit fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the hood was bigger. Fits in the body but the hood doesn’t fit the head very well. Doesn’t come forward enough even though the body was smaller then the size purchased. But body fit as expected. 3 yr old loved it. Gets too hot so only wears as dress up and not to sleep in overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great onesie. Super soft material inside and out
customer_reviews.text: Great onesie. Super soft material inside and out. My son loves it. Unfortunately has two holes but not too bad to not be able to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice W.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy about the quality of the fabric (thick and soft)
customer_reviews.text: I am happy about the quality of the fabric (thick and soft). Surprised it fits tight (size 14-16 for a 11 year old wearing 10-12 clothes usually). She wears it in the house and won't sleep in it because she says she will be too hot. The position of the tail (under the but) is a little weird. But very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great item for costume, winter PJs
customer_reviews.text: Got the Lion pjs. My daughter is 4 but tall for her age so I got her the 5-6 size (about what she normally wears in clothing size). It fits beautifully. Its super fuzzy and warm, too. Most important, she loves it! We're using it for a Halloween costume, then playing dress up and winter pajamas. I hate buying a costume that the kids wear just once, which is why I got this item instead of a regular costume.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very cute Halloween outfit for our 19-month old. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Halloween outfit for our 19-month old. I wish the hood with the face went a little further on the forehead. It fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kat W.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: This is too cute for words!!!! My grandson wore it for pajamas almost every night after Christmas until it was too warm to wear a blanket sleeper. He won't fit into it next winter, so you can be sure I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 6yr old
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to see this delivery because my daughter was super pumped to wear this lion outfit. Unfortunately it came with a hole in the tail area (delivered today) and I have to send it back. Trying to explain why she can't wear her lion costume/pajamas sucks. Hopefully, the replacement will get here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E Edwards IV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect As A Costume or PJs!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! This costume is SO soft, and warm. He usually wears 3T so I ordered the largest size. I give 4 stars because the costume fit perfectly, except the hood was too small to go up once the costume was fully zipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kailea

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a tall 3 year old. So I ordered the size 4. Its a bit small and the head is super small. Like its a size for a 2 year old and the head is the size for an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching comes undone with little use
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these pajamas for my daughter twice and both times, the stiching in the crotch area has came undone. I travel a lot therefore my daughter stays with her mother and rarely uses these pajamas. Because of my travels, the return date is past due so I am stuck with pajamas that come apart after being used only a few times. DO NOT PURCHASE THESE PAJAMAS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cute. Will turn my grandson into a teddy bear rather than a monster! A good buy! Arrived on the day they said it would!
customer_reviews.author: KC Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Fun dress for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this dress and simply refuse to even remove it even for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Subbarao V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was too big but he has grown to fit it, now outgrown it, great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried that this would be too big for my niece, who is a 2T. They accidentally sent a 3T, but it fit her perfectly with plently of room to grow! It was so soft, she pulled it out of the box and immediately laid down to take a nap with it
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and cute. My daughter is using them for her Halloween costume. They came on time and we're much better quality then I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The item was not as pictured, it has feet. I bought this one specifically because it didn't have feet. Also, my daughter is 34 months old & average size but this item it a bit snug so she won't be playing with it very long. I only kept it because she saw it....
customer_reviews.author: N. Ellingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute. But arrived with a small hole in the seam. We were able to sew it up and you can't tell but I prefer that things I buy brand new come without flaws. That said it doesn't bother my son. It is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mommybug2

customer_reviews.title: My daughter who is a bigger 2. 5 year ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is a bigger 2.5 year old, wore this for Halloween and it fit perfectly! It was a cold evening and she was toasty and warm in it with just some light layers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: ITEM RUNS EXTREMELY SMALL!!! Tag the seller attached had a different size than the actual tag on the costume!!
customer_reviews.text: Item ran so small we had to give to our younger daughter for Christmas, and the one we bought it for didn't get one. Was a Christmas gift so VERY disappointed. Also, the tag the seller attached had a different size than the actual tag on the costume. So ridiculous. VERY upset!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: On time, as advertised, a bit small
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time in soft packaging (plastic envelop) in good condition. looks like reasonable quality, but just barely fit my 12 year old girl (average height and slim) so lion face hood is very tight and lion face is not visible on the very top of her head.
customer_reviews.author: ionei

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my eleven years old son to use in his school's Xmas program. He wears a youth size 14 and it fit perfectly. He loves how cozy and warm they are. Super comfy and cute!!
customer_reviews.author: razzmazz

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume but it came with a hole in the shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Halloween. The costume is super warm and very cute. The only thing is when it arrived it had a huge hole in the shoulder and as the night progressed another hole started under the arm. I would say it held up for Halloween but I don't think I would last as a regular set of PJs.
customer_reviews.author: DHo

customer_reviews.title: The 18 month is pretty true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my nephew so he could wear it during this super cold winter, and it fits the bill very well. It's warm, he looks ADORABLE, and he likes it. The only thing is the hood is a little small. He's kind of a long 14 Mo old, and it's already getting a little snug, but it will fit him without the hood for at least 5 or 6 more months. It was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Lilly N.

customer_reviews.title: I found a little guy that would fit into them nicely. And I ordered another size for a bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: They were too small but I looked at the size incorrectly, I found a little guy that would fit into them nicely. And I ordered another size for a bigger guy. So it actually worked out fine. I kept them because they were adorable
customer_reviews.author: Judy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great PJ
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Comfortable fabric ans very cute design. Far warning that they are extremely warm. Works well for me since I live in Northeast, but can only be worn in winter.
customer_reviews.author: D Critique

customer_reviews.title: very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, the head is kinda small, but the body fit well. also, ours came with feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pasquariello

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and my son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and my son loved it. It's not the most soft and cozy feeling on the inside, and he's usually very sensitive to that sort of thing, but was so enamored of the suit that he wore it all winter, even ice-skating til some girl pink-shamed him!
customer_reviews.author: ladydoctor

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cute, toddler approved!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a bear costume to wear for fun. She was thrilled with this outfit. It’s very warm. I don’t know that I would let her sleep in it. But for playing, she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: skr2010

customer_reviews.title: Fun PJs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son-ordered the 14-16; he's 10 and wears 10H pants and this is baggy on him and the legs a little long but fits how it should. It's really soft and looks to be well made. The hood has a jersey lining, which is nice. Would totally purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Teague

customer_reviews.title: One time use costume
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 4 for a very small 4 year old and it was a little too small, lengthwise. It’s kinda weird too, unless he looked down so you could see the face, looked more like a camel from the side
customer_reviews.author: LeahJA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 12 y/o Daughter loves it. Fit was on the small side but still good
customer_reviews.author: Cace411

customer_reviews.title: That was fine - I just put his shoes on over it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a costume for my 3 year old. It's soft and he didn't want to take it off. It came with footies (unlike the picture). That was fine - I just put his shoes on over it. Consider sizing up by one size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Length as expected. Only concern is that the hood is shallow. Only half the head is covered, it does not make it anywhere close to his forehead, therefore, the face of the panda is not really visible.
customer_reviews.author: kmva

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderfully soft plush
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderfully soft plush. So cuddly, I was worried that it would be a cheaper material, but I was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: La Rubia

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large. Material is soft both inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit large. Material is soft both inside and outside. Did have to repair a seam after one wearing. FYI - Is NOT a footed onesie.
customer_reviews.author: Auntizoo

customer_reviews.title: ... this for our four year old daughter and she loved it! However
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our four year old daughter and she loved it! However, she wore them ONCE for Xmas eve and they literally fell apart! I'll be contacted the seller requesting a refund or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this Bunny pj outfit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this Bunny pj outfit. My granddaughter had to put it on and hop around in her soft cuddly bunny outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: not thin and cheesy like I expected
customer_reviews.text: Plush material, not thin and cheesy like I expected. Sizes run a little small. Overall I'm very happy with this costume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this duck bodysuit! It's very soft and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: 2for1

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: 3T size fit my 3 year old toddler perfectly. She was warm for Halloween indoors (with layers) but might be difficult to get shoes on for outside trick or treating since it is a zip footie type of deal. Looks super cute and allowed her to run around as well. It's gone through the wash twice now with no complaints. Win!
customer_reviews.author: R. George

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves this bunny suit! She's 3 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this bunny suit! She's 3 and wears a 3T. The suit is just slightly too big which will give her room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: This outfit is absolutely adorable! We bought the 4T and it fit my 3.5 year old perfectly!! He loves walking around like a bear and says he likes how soft it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my average sized 10 year old. I sized up, and I'm glad I did. It definitely runs small!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit was more cute than durable. My daughter only got to wear it one time before the seam started coming out of the back portion near the tail. To make matters worse, it was during pajama day at school when it happened! I was expecting somewhat better quality for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: FDB

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 mo old grand daughter because she is obsessed with Giraffes. Unfortunately it looks more like a cow. Had I not had it shipped directly to her I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Butler

customer_reviews.title: If anyone could get me in contact with the company that makes this outfit I would really like to know if they will have more in stock ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is our ring "Bear" for our wedding! He absolutely loves the outfit but it is a little snug! We bought a 4T and really need a 5-6T and they are sold out! If anyone could get me in contact with the company that makes this outfit I would really like to know if they will have more in stock before July 10th! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Groom in Trouble

customer_reviews.title: 2T was a little short
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and so cute, but the 2T ran small. My son is currently comfortably in 2T (some brands are even too big on him), but this was on the shorter side. Otherwise, perfect for our Xmas card photo!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it's big but big and comfy lol love going to the store in this thing
customer_reviews.author: I_bought_it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Description accurately described the product - I got what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: sharron mcelmeel

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller
customer_reviews.text: 2T-3T. Hood barely fits on his head. It’s october and he just turned 2 in September. He is an average size 2 year old. Is very soft. Quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Its super soft and just adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son has been living in this animal onesie since the day we received it. Its super soft and just adorable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: kaykyoo

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my nieces birthday and it made her so happy!! It was super cute and super comfy! Fit is true to size
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these. We have the bear and the giraffe
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. We have the bear and the giraffe. I had to buy the giraffe because my three year old wouldn't take off the bear and I needed something for him to wear when I washed it. They are super cute and comfy. I did have to get my 3 years old a size 5/6. I got him a 4T for the bear and it fit but was snug.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and a bunch of her friends all got ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and a bunch of her friends all got these animal onesie for a sleepover. My daughter is 4'6" 70 lbs and got a 10/12. It fits well and because it doesn't have feet, it will fit for probably a few more years. It washes well and seems to be holding up
customer_reviews.author: Dunovan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: He’s obsessed with Kung Fu Panda so it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: So cute, warm and fuzzy my two year old loves it. He’s obsessed with Kung Fu Panda so it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and washes well but it is small
customer_reviews.text: Bought for child 5 ft tall. Great quality and washes well but it is small.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Henson

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it, wears it all the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves it, wears it all the time and seems to handle a wash very well. Def would by from buyer again
customer_reviews.author: P figs

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I did go a little large when ordering. My daughter will have room to grow into. I would use size chart it is correct
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Drake

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Hot, itchy fabric and ours came with feet (contrary to how it's pictured above). I had to return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES these duck pajamas! She would wear them every day if I let her. They are so snuggly soft! I just wish we sized up one because they do run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mundo

customer_reviews.title: A bear for Barrett
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, Barrett, called Bear would wear them day and night. He's 3 and likes being a bear, like himself
customer_reviews.author: pklerose

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Product came with failed stitching at the crotch. Too big of a hassle to ship back etc. Had a seamstress fix it.
customer_reviews.author: John Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable on my kids. They love it and it is just perfect for cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So soft and SO cute!!! My 8yr old loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This is the best jammie ever!!! So super soft and comfy. Perfect gift for my 7 year old's first slumber party!!!! Now i want one...
customer_reviews.author: Monica Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Cute outfit, nice material but it runs small. We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: RiderRalph

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Almost too small for my little on but great quality. I love that I am able to throw it in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael D Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Replacing kids with Pandas for the cuteness factor
customer_reviews.text: Just so cute and fit perfectly! The little tail on the back makes it even cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fit her just fine.
customer_reviews.text: She loves the jumpsuit and it has the softest material. It fit her just fine.
customer_reviews.author: mdapice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. The body part is s good size runs a little big got 4t. But the head part is way too small!
customer_reviews.author: CFrance

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The best kids onesie! Love it! It's adorable and super soft and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrroni

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and room to grow some.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little roomy which is perfect. Fun to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: the outfit is cute and warm but mine came with ...
customer_reviews.text: the outfit is cute and warm but mine came with 2 holes in it other then that my daughter loves it im in the middle of trying to get them to replace it now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this onesie. It's a great pajama to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Dragon Onesie
customer_reviews.text: Onesie arrived with feet when product description led me to believe otherwise. Company was very accommodating in resolving things. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Grisanti

customer_reviews.title: My kid loved it. It is really soft to the touch ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! My kid loved it. It is really soft to the touch and comfortable to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful. And sooo soft and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. And sooo soft and adorable. My grandddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son looked adorable, but the seams came undone super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Guttenburg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that they didn't have feet
customer_reviews.text: Such soft material. She loves them. Disappointed that they didn't have feet. Was looking for footed pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Henson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: V cute, soft and push. Will definitely be worn past halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing!!!!

customer_reviews.title: The body of the suit fit well but the hood ...
customer_reviews.text: The body of the suit fit well but the hood was too small. I bought this for my petite 4 year old niece and she couldn't keep the hood on because it was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. LEMIEUX

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate pictures
customer_reviews.text: Came with feet and the pictures show it's footless, not very happy about the inaccurate pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alison uribe

customer_reviews.title: The adult ones are SUPER small.
customer_reviews.text: Kid onsie fit well from this company. The adult ones are SUPER small.
customer_reviews.author: ldavis

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality...also got panda and it's great but teddy is kinda lame.
customer_reviews.author: Holly McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY 2 year old never takes it off and it’s so soft
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Holcroft

customer_reviews.title: This looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture. It is SUPER soft, outside AND inside! We are giving it for Christmas, but my daughter is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gayhart

customer_reviews.title: Tore after 2 wears
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece. It tore after 2 wears. For the price I expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 12m is not 12 medium its months. I ordered wrong size..what a bunmer
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this price very good quality indeed. I ordered 7-8 size giraffe. The size is true.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

product_meta.title: Just Love Jumpsuit for Kids Children Pajamas
feature_bullets: Ultra-soft material that keeps you warm
Cute, Cozy, and comfortable with a zipper
Fits true to Size and machine washable
